name: VocabularyTrainer
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vocabulary trainer
des:
Improve your vocabulary by listening to at least 2000 words and their definitions. Compete against others to see who has listened to the most words. Challenge your friends to top the leaderboard.

Premium content: Get access to an extra 3000 words
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
